# NSSlider.SliderType.circular

**Case**

A dial representing an angular range.

## Declaration

```swift
case circular
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **NSSlider.SliderType.linear**: A bar representing a range, and a knob indicating the currently selected value.

items.description: A bar representing a range, and a knob indicating the currently selected value.
items.name: NSSlider.SliderType.linear
